data.name: Help
data.value:
Lanchat: LAN chat and file transfer https://youkai.pl/lanchat-docs
Tab / Shift+Tab - tabs switching Up Arrow / Down Arrow - input history PageUp / PageDown - scrolling
Commands: connect disconnect nick block unblock blocked afk dnd online send accept reject exit help
Try /help <command> for more info.
Config file can be found in: {0}

data.name: Help_connect
data.value: Usage: /connect <ip> /connect <ip> <port> /connect <domain> /connect <domain> <port> Description: Connect with other users.

data.name: Help_nick
data.value: Usage: /nick <new_nick> Description: Changes user nickname. Nickname have to be between 1-20 characters

data.name: Help_block
data.value: Usage: /block <id> /block <IP address> Description: Prevent from connecting to specified user. If you are not currently connected you can block by IP address.

data.name: Help_unblock
data.value: Usage: /unblock <IP address> Description: Unblock user. You have to user IP address in argument. Check /blocked command for blocked addresses list.

data.name: Help_send
data.value: Usage: /send <id> <file path> Description: Send file. Make sure path in argument doesn't have quotation marks. If the target user accepts the request, the transfer will begin.

data.name: Help_accept
data.value: Usage: /accept <id> Description: Accept incoming file transfer request.

data.name: Help_accept
data.value: Usage: /reject <id> Description: Reject incoming file transfer request.

data.name: FreshRsa
data.value: To make sure the connection with {0} is secure check fingerprint in "Users" tab.

data.name: RsaChanged
data.value: Public key of {0} has changed. Connection may be not secure.

data.name: WrongNickname
data.value: Nickname must be shorter than 20 characters and cannot be blank

data.name: FileTransferInProgress
data.value: Cannot send multiple files at once.

data.name: CannotAccessFile
data.value: Cannot access {0}. File name or permissions may be wrong.
